name: Space Shootout (itch) (MadMelon999)
description:
You are a spaceship that can only accelerate and rotate. You have a blade in front of you that can destroy other spaceships, and a flame that propels you forward.

To complete each level, you need to defeat all of the red spaceships, either by flying strait into them, by frying them with your flame, or by making them fly into their own ally's blast.

Space to accelerate, mouse/trackpad to rotate. 

Also if controls don't work at beginning, press down on mouse/trackpad. For some reason it works
